nodes.text: "Ghost" was a story found in Star Wars Tales 11, written and illustrated by Jan Duursema.

It involves a young Han Solo attempting to find a lost treasure and encountering the old Jedi Quinlan Vos, who is on the run from bounty hunters. Solo later finds out that the treasure is Quinlan's lightsaber.
A reader asked in the Q&A section of Star Wars Insider 99 why Han didn't believe in the Force. This tale was mentioned within the response, but was stated to not be part of continuity.
